alert.note: Alert for McIntosh (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 1:59AM CDT until August 11 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern McIntosh County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 159 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles southwest of Lake Eufaula State Park, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Eufaula... Checotah... Rentiesville... Stidham... Lake Eufaula State Park... Onapa... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 259 and 270. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
